word: The angels of God are in our world, and satanic agencies are here also. I am permitted to see the inclination of certain ones to follow their own strong traits of character. If they refuse to yoke up with others who have had a long experience in the work, they will become blinded by self-confidence, not discerning  between the false and the true. It is not safe that such ones should stand in the position of leaders, to follow their own judgment and plans.
